name: global_vars.pages_config
way: Sets the rules for Pages object. It's an associative array (in JS language - an object), which was serialized as a string. Example: |a::1||b::2||c::3| = {a: 1, b: 2, c: 3}. More about the configuration you can read at controlled object page.

request.name: ID 0
request.info: If one of the keys equals 0 or there's no serialization applied at all, incoming information is applied as universal user default, if there's no conflicts
